title: test 2405, 2101, 2100 started crashing on macOS in CI

labels.name: appleOS
labels.description: specific to an Apple operating system

body:
### I did this

Watching CI runs, this started happening in macOS jobs:
```
sh: line 1: 19811 Abort trap: 6           ./libtest/libtests lib2405 http://127.0.0.1:53836/2405 > log/16/stdout2405 2> log/16/stderr2405
[...]
test 2405...[checking curl_multi_waitfds functionality]

libtests returned 134, when expecting 0
 2405: exit FAILED
[...]
FAIL 2405: 'checking curl_multi_waitfds functionality' multi, HTTP, HTTP/2
```
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/14160363601/job/39664985716
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/14156059130/job/39655479819
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/14155636870/job/39654510409
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/14149632962/job/39641192255

Fails the same way in many jobs in an unrelated PR after rebasing to master:
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/14161511749?pr=16840

Also:
test 2100:
```
sh: line 1: 19270 Abort trap: 6           ../src/curl -q --output log/18/curl2100.out --include --trace-ascii log/18/trace2100 --trace-config all --trace-time http://foo.example.com:49244/2100 --doh-url http://127.0.0.1:49244/21000001 > log/18/stdout2100 2> log/18/stderr2100
[...]
test 2100...[HTTP GET using DoH (with HTTPS RR)]

 2100: protocol FAILED:
[...]
FAIL 2100: 'HTTP GET using DoH (with HTTPS RR)' HTTP, HTTP GET, DOH
```
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/14156059130/job/39655479349

and test 2101:
```
sh: line 1: 18852 Abort trap: 6           ../src/curl -q --output log/1/curl2101.out --include --trace-ascii log/1/trace2101 --trace-config all --trace-time http://neverreached.example.com/ --doh-url http://127.0.0.1:50866/21010001 -m 1 > log/1/stdout2101 2> log/1/stderr2101
[...]
test 2101...[DoH without response]

curl returned 134, when expecting 28,6
 2101: exit FAILED
[...]
FAIL 2101: 'DoH without response' HTTP, HTTP GET, DOH
```
https://github.com/curl/curl/actions/runs/14145916141/job/39633196165

First seen after commit:
19226f9bb106347e21d1dd113f2e2aeff53ca925 #16847

### I expected the following

These tests passing on macOS consistently.

### curl/libcurl version

~ 19226f9bb106347e21d1dd113f2e2aeff53ca925

### operating system

seen on macOS
